data.questText: The Alchemist that created the slime was a bit of a recluse. We need to find his notes to figure out the best way to defeat these creatures. Find 10 scraps from his journal and we can reconstruct his formula.
data.completeText: His thoughts are... disturbing. Apparently he was cursed with intense and traumatic nightmares. I'm not sure he still had a grip on reality there at the end.
